Doctor-led emotional wellness care

Anxiety

A holistic, doctor-guided program that helps reduce anxiety, overthinking, panic tendencies and emotional imbalance using Homeopathy, Nervous System Support and Lifestyle Healing.

How It Works
Doctor-led emotional wellness care
Safe and natural mind–body healing

How Our Treatment Works

A medically guided step-by-step plan tailored for this condition.

Calming Emotional Turbulence

Homeopathic medicines help stabilise emotional sensitivity, reduce overthinking and calm mental restlessness.

Nervous System Support

Strengthens the nervous system, reducing panic-like symptoms such as chest tightness and heart racing.

Sleep & Hormonal Balance

Improves sleep cycles and balances cortisol — the stress hormone responsible for anxiety spikes.

What’s Causing This Condition?

We diagnose underlying triggers and address the root causes, not just symptoms.

Overactive Stress Response

Anxiety leads to constant fight–flight activation causing restlessness and panic.

Nervous System Hypersensitivity

An overly sensitive nervous system reacts strongly to emotional or physical triggers.

Hormonal & Chemical Imbalance

Imbalances in stress hormones and neurotransmitters worsen anxiety symptoms.

Sleep Disturbances

Poor sleep increases irritability, fear-based thinking and anxiety spikes.

Physical Stress Reactions

Chest tightness, fast heartbeat and shortness of breath occur due to anxiety loops.

Common Symptoms

Symptoms vary from person to person — here are the most commonly reported ones.

Overthinking & excessive worry

Restlessness

Racing thoughts

Sleep disturbance

Chest tightness or fast heartbeat

Feeling overwhelmed

Panic-like sensations

Frequently Asked Questions

Clear answers to the most common questions about our holistic, doctor-guided treatment programs.

Is homeopathy effective for hair fall?

Yes. It treats internal causes such as stress, hormones and digestion for long-term regrowth.

How long before I see results?

Most patients experience fall control within 3–4 weeks and new growth from 5–10 weeks.

Is this treatment safe for women?

100% safe for PCOS, postpartum, thyroid-related hair fall and hormonal imbalance.

How is Modern Clinic different?

We combine Homeopathy, Nutrition and Stress Healing to correct the root cause naturally.
